abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33288645, pmid33323917, pmid33306721, pmid33273060, pmid33306235, pmid33200786, pmid33301429, pmid33326621, pmid33229462, pmid33306990, pmid33319496, pmid33326636
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.12.29
